title: Remove a suppression that is necessary only when building Guava with JDK 8.
body:
Remove a suppression that is necessary only when building Guava with JDK 8.

Guava continues to support users who build and run their own code under JDK 8; this is [only about how we build Guava ourselves](https://github.com/google/guava/issues/6549).

RELNOTES=n/a
author: copybara-service[bot]
